com.cloudant.sync.replication

Class PullFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudant.sync.replication.PullFilter

  • public class PullFilter
extends java.lang.Object

    Provides the name and parameters for a filter function to be used when a pull replication calls the source database's _changes feed.

    For a filter function that takes no parameters, use this constructor:

     PullFilter filter = new PullFilter("filterDoc/filterFunctionName")

    For a filter function that requires parameters, use this constructor:

     Map<String, String> params = new HashMap();
 map.put("max_age", "10");
 map.put("name", "john");
 PullFilter pullFilter = new PullFilter("doc/filterName", map);
    See Also:
    Controlling documents replicated, Filter functions CouchDB docs

    • Constructor Detail

      • PullFilter

        public PullFilter(java.lang.String filterName)
        Constructs a filter object for a function that requires no parameters.
        Parameters:
        filterName - filter function name. The filterName argument is the name of the filter, as passed to the filter parameter of CouchDB's _changes feed. This and the name of the filter function, separated by a slash. For example, filterDoc/filterFunctionName

      • PullFilter

        public PullFilter(java.lang.String filterName,
                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters)
        Constructs a filter object for a function that requires no parameters.
        Parameters:
        filterName - filter function name. The filterName argument is the name of the filter, as passed to the filter parameter of CouchDB's _changes feed. This and the name of the filter function, separated by a slash. For example, filterDoc/filterFunctionName
        parameters - Any parameters required for the function. Can be null. The contents of properties are expanded to key=value pairs when constructing the _changes feed call for the remote database. Integer values should be added as String objects.
        See Also:
        Filter functions CouchDB docs

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()

      • getParameters

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getParameters()

      • toQueryString

        public java.lang.String toQueryString()

        Generate a string representation of this Filter object that is consistent for a given name and parameter set.

        The string is not intended for use in URLs as it's not escaped.

        Filter parameters are sorted by key so that the generated String are the same for different calls. This is important because the String can therefore be part of the replication ID.

        Returns:
        Query string like representation of the filter
        See Also:
        BasicPullStrategy.getReplicationId()
